response:
Modern Day Sniper Project Overview

Project Name: Modern Day Sniper

Jordan Oakes contributed significantly to the enhancement of the Modern Day Sniper (MDS) platform, focusing on creating a seamless user experience. The project involved two main phases:

  • Ecommerce Frontend Development: Jordan collaborated on developing a modern ecommerce frontend. This phase focused on improving user interaction and the overall shopping experience, making it easier for users to navigate and purchase products.
  • Membership Dashboard Design: Following the ecommerce improvements, Jordan designed a membership dashboard tailored to the needs of MDS users. This dashboard incorporated AI-driven features to enhance user engagement and learning, providing a personalized experience for each member.

The combination of these enhancements significantly boosted the platform's effectiveness, focusing on user-centered design principles and innovative technology solutions.

For more details on this project, you can visit the Modern Day Sniper project page.
